parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of shares to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: The shares list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of data object shares from the metastore. The caller must be a metastore admin or the owner of the share. There is no guarantee of a specific ordering of the elements in the array.
